attributes.action: put pressure on foreign embassies to ensure that applications for employment visas are dealt with urgently and passports returned immediately after examination and fees are returned where the application is rejected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: .My grandson has now been waiting for 8 weeks for an employment visa to work in Goa. He sent a cheque for £365 ( 2 weeks of his salary) with his passport, application form and all required documentation on the 21st August to Indian Visa Supermarket, The cheque was cleared through the bank on the 25th August and since then he has phoned every day without any news. His passport and documentation has not been returned and no-one appears to know when the embassy will respond. Unless he can reach Goa by the end of October he will lose the offer of employment.Under the present system he willlose £365 and cannot look for other employemnt abroad because he has not got his pasport back. What other system would allow someone to keep a fee for a service they have not supplied ?

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Indian Embassy.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
